text: Shim Wan-koo (Korean: 심완구; Hanja: 沈完求; RR: Sim Wan-gu; 1 July 1938 – 8 June 2020) was a South Korean politician. He was the first elected Mayor of Ulsan from 1997 to 2002. He was a member of the National Assembly from 1985 to 1992. Shim died on 8 June 2020 in Seoul, aged 81. ==References== Category:South Korean politicians Category:Mayors Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Shim Wan-koo
